_comment: Business-day holidays configuration. Stores the number of non-working days per CALENDAR month.
_usage: Key by calendar year, then calendar month (1-12). Example: Work in November 2025 = '2025' -> '11'
_note: Use the CALENDAR month where work happens (typically invoice month - 1). For Dec 2025 invoice (Nov 17 - Dec 16), work is in Nov 2025, so use '11'
_start_date: Holidays are only applied from November 2025 onwards
_types: Include both Brazilian national/bank holidays AND personal non-working days that fall within the calendar month
